Text: I don't see any biathlon in there... :((
Aren't you going to release biathlon and xc-skiing from Eurosport? It seems that they are not being released at TheBox.bz. :(
Women's Biathlon 7.5km Sprint (13th February 2010) is up at thebox.bz but not sure if they'll be doing the mens event.

Ok, they are just slow then. :)

If they aren't going to do the xc-skiing, are you going to do them?..

16-Feb-2010 9am
I'll put the cross country individual events (10km women and 15km men) up later today.

On the BBC last night they devoted about 5 minutes to cross country. Eurosport switched over to the downhill race before the womens x-country event had finished, so I'm capturing the repeat this morning which hopefully will cover more of the events. I didn't see last nights mens event as I was busy with other stuff.

The problem is the thebox.bz don't allow British Eurosport as it's not a British production company.

The problem is that the BBC coverage is chopping and changing all the time where as Eurosport coverage is almost constant.
Well could you then perhaps continue uploading xc-skiing races here, like you used to do? Why TheBox.bz?..
